A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There were up and down. There were hope then despair. There were mysteries that were assumed they could not be solved\, yet\, the answer was something everyone knew but no one expected. 
Have to say that this chapter is a little long and they might have pushed to the edge too much before delivering the final blow. A bit out of the topic but about 10 minutes from the beginning\, PC. I think it's time they respond to the critics. Backtracking\, it was a little hard to get used to the plot but I think every detail has its own purpose. The conflict\, the balance. Intuitive vs Rationality.  
"How can we build the resistants from this?" (R.)
"We have everything we need here" (L.)
